original_title: Manuale di cinematografia per dilettanti – Vol. I
overview: Against the backdrop of Italy in the years of the Fascist dictatorship, a man of wealth but unknown to history scrutinises the world with his little film camera. He is guided and instructed in the process by a handbook in which the germs of the ideology are concealed beneath the apparent objectivity of technique. But ineffable signs of resistance still surface in the images.
title: Manuale di cinematografia per dilettanti – Vol. I
